text: Can "content alignment > center content > maximum content width" set to a default value? Right now it's set to 1000pxâ€”can I update that number?

question... I've setup 2x test accounts (dev and qa)... expire in 90 days flavor... and Im trying to connect two purpose built apps to each of those respectively.  Within the app, I've setup the OAuth callback... and gone through the step to authorize each account w/ the respective app... but the apps fail to appear in the accounts connected apps... and the subscriptions do not fire.
Do test accounts not support apps?  or not support apps via OAuth?
any other suggestions?  I did not think this would be hard.  It's just invoking a simple webhook to throw a status change in HS to an upstream system.
